actions: The pentadrone makes five arm attacks.
*Melee Weapon Attack:* +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

The pentadrone ex hales a 30 foot cone of gas. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
description: Pentadrones oversee Mechanus's worker populace and can improvise in response to new situations.
name: Pentadrone
traits: The pentadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.
If the pentadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.
